titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Sterling Township records [microform]

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.scopecontent: Microfilmed selection from records of Sterling Township, including township general record, 1883-1904; treasurer's book, 1871-1881; township treasurer's account book, 1896-1907; clerk's account book, 1882-1902; town election records, 1900-1909; justice docket; highway records, 1872-1905; records of the primary schools, 1838-1865; and township library records, 1878-1904.
